name: Claw Machine - Toy Prizes
description:
If you like playing claw arcade machines and like winning toy prizes then you will love Claw Machine – Toy Prizes.

No need to travel to your local supermarket or local arcades to use claw vending machines when you have your very own in your pocket.

You also get your very own toy collectors room where you can show off all your cool new surprise toys to your family and friend.

Claw Machine – Toy Prizes is totally free and is a great game for kids of all ages!
This is the full app.
